deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

addNpo(string,string,string,string,addre.details: The administrator can add a new NPO

params._address: the ERC20 address of the npo

addProject(string,string,string,uint256,.details: This function will allow to add a project, the owner will be the one who calls the function.

params._campaignDurationInDays: the duration of the collection of funds
params._campaignStartDate: the beginning of the collection of funds
params._city: the city where the project will be located.
params._maxAmount: The maximum price to make the project a success
params._minAmount: The minimum price for the project to be valid
params._startDate: The start date of the project

getProject(uint256,address).details: This function allows to return a project of type Project according to the ERC address of the NPO and the index.

params._id: index of the project list that the address has

returns._0: Documents the return variables of a contracts function state variable

userdoc.notice: EthicOnChain contract to manage NPOs, Projects and Donors
